bike.description: Specialized FSR technology, A1 Premium Aluminum TransForm Monocoque frame w/ reinforced seat pod, ORE technology supercross reinforced down tube/seatstay/chainstays, increased thickness forged head tube, full sealed cartridge bearing pivots,  replaceable derailleur hanger, supercross specific adjustable geometry (BB height, HT angles)

components.description: Fox Vanilla R, rebound adj., coil spring, 6.5" eye to eye, 1.5" stroke
Alloy collar with Q/R, 34.9mm clamp I.D., black
Disc brake specific routing, rear derailleur hanger, owner's manual, chainstay/seatstay protectors
